game.name: Duel Champions - Roguelike Trading Card Game
game.shortDescription: Play quick card duels, open booster packs, discover new cards and build the best deck to face your next opponent. Duel Champions offers a highly replayable singleplayer TCG experience. Ready to duel?
game.shortDescriptionEn: Play quick card duels, open booster packs, discover new cards and build the best deck to face your next opponent. Duel Champions offers a highly replayable singleplayer TCG experience. Ready to duel?
game.developers: Alexander Van den Bulck, Harry Lane
game.publishers: Alexander Van den Bulck, Harry Lane
